author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 27-year-old mason allegedly killed his wife by slitting her throat and later attempted suicide at his house in Hegde Nagar here over a domestic row on Wednesday.

Treatment

While Mamatha (22) succumbed to her injuries on the way to the hospital, the accused, Narayanaswamy, is under treatment in Victoria Hospital.

According to the police, Narayanaswamy frequently fought with his wife, suspecting her of infidelity.

The couple, married three years ago, has a one-year-old son.

On Wednesday night, they had another fight during which Narayanaswamy allegedly slashed Mamatha’s neck with a kitchen knife and later attempted suicide by slashing his own neck.

The incident came to light when the baby boy woke up to the commotion and started crying loudly, attracting the attention of the neighbours.

Mamatha’s parents, in their complaint to Sampigehalli police, said that Narayanaswamy harassed her frequently.

They said that Mamatha had even returned home claiming she did not want to live with Narayanaswamy any more, but they counselled and convinced her to go back.

Case

Based on their complaint, the Sampigehalli police have registered a case of murder.

The police said that the

incident occurred over a domestic row
title: Mason ‘kills’ wife, attempts suicide
